text: I’m honestly baffled by the Michelin recommendation. This place didn’t live up to any of the hype. From the moment we walked in, the staff was unwelcoming and borderline rude. The food? Completely average—nothing memorable, nothing that justified the price or reputation. Definitely not worth the trip or the wait.
They gave us less food but charged us full price. We were short 2 servings when we ate here but they still charged us for 2 servings. There were too many people so we had to queue.
Poor Service, Long Wait. I have to wait 2 hours and they took our orders wrong. Not recommend
Very good frog and chilli crab. Singnature of Singapore.
I never left a bad review before, but the staffs here are rude in a whole different level. Do they still deserve their star??? Food is so very overrated. Not worth the price
